Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ipecac \Ip"e*cac\ ([i^]p"[-e]*k[a^]k), n. An abbreviation of {Ipecacuanha}, and in more frequent use. [1913 Webster]
ipecac n : a medicinal drug used to evoke vomiting (especially in cases of drug overdose or poisoning)
